metadata.title: CVE-2020-29074 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
scan.c in x11vnc 0.9.16 uses IPC_CREAT|0777 in shmget calls, which allowsaccess by actors other than the current user.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-29074` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

x11vnc - 0.9.16-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: x11vnc package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.16-5').
